name: Fatal Thrust
description:
CAN YOU SURVIVE THE ARENA??

In Fatal Thrust you will have to kill off hordes of enemies to prove you are the best, be crowned champion and win ONE BILION CREDITS!! But wait! It's not so easy. Each round you will have to spin THE WHEEL OF FATE! 

How long is this one going to last?

This project was made by the Knights of Fortune for 2020's Beginner's Circle  Game Jam. 

MEET OUR TEAM:

  • Jake Gosche - lead programmer
  • Nimrod K Carmi Steinberg - programmer & concept artist
  • Giordano Nin - project manager & game designer
  • Alyona Sokolova - team lead & graphic designer
  • Daniel Moroz -  3D artist
  • Igor Shvetsov - 3D artist
  • Karthick Gunasekaran - 3D artist
  • Edwin Gray - SFX designer
  • Nikita Sapozhnikov - main theme composer
  •  Mikhail  Kotov - narrative designer
